thread.section_title: Citadines Trafalgar Square London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and nice apartment close to everything
thread.title_full: Clean and nice apartment close to everything - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: jennyj974
title: Clean and nice apartment close to everything
text: Nice clean apartment, good beds. Close to almost subway and buses. We stayed in a 2 bedroom apartment, the apartment was clean and there was enough space for all of us 5 people. The staff was very nice and helpful. Next time in London we will book this hotel again.
